meaning: Having a slightly low temperature; mildly or pleasantly cold.
example: Linen has made cool and breathable clothing for millennia.

meaning: To work or act together, especially for a common purpose or benefit.
A number representing the position of a point along a line, arc, or similar one-dimensional figure.
example: Give me your coordinates and we'll come and rescue you.

meaning: One who coordinates.
A machine that copies graphical material; a duplicator.
example: a file copier; a disk copier

meaning: The right by law to be the entity which determines who may publish, copy and distribute a piece of writing, music, picture or other work of authorship.
example: Copyright is a separate legal area from trademarks.

meaning: A harmonic set of three or more notes that is heard as if sounding simultaneously.
example: He looped some cord around his fingers.

meaning: Having no cord; especially using batteries instead of mains electricity
The act of correcting.
example: I have four T-80 tanks at grid Three-niner-niner-four-eight-eight, Correction: Grid Three niner-niner-four-eight-five. How copy? Over.

meaning: In a correct manner.
Friendly discussion.
Any substances applied to enhance the external color or texture of the skin, e.g. lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner; makeup.
example: a cosmetic preparation

meaning: Of high cost; expensive.
example: a costly activity

meaning: A style of dress, including garments, accessories and hairstyle, especially as characteristic of a particular country, period or people.
example: The dancer was wearing Highland costume.

meaning: A professional who counsels people, especially on personal problems.
A rural area, or the rural part of a larger area.
example: We live in the Swedish countryside.

meaning: A section of a ticket, showing the holder to be entitled to some specified accommodation or service, as to a passage over a designated line of travel, a particular seat in a theater, a discount, etc.
example: Jenna coupons and she goes through three magazines a day to find the coupons.

meaning: A person who looks after and guides tourists
example: We'll have the contract couriered to you.

meaning: Polite behavior.
example: He was always known for his grace, kindness, and courtesy to people of every rank.

meaning: Somebody with whom one works.
example: He heard from a coworker that the company planned to merge those departments.

meaning: Any bird of the family Gruidae, large birds with long legs and a long neck which is extended during flight.
The ability to use imagination to produce a novel idea or product that is useful to society.
example: His creativity is unsurpassed by his fellow students in the art class.

meaning: A single criterion.
example: Criterion of choice, of decision, of selection

meaning: A sea or lake voyage, especially one taken for pleasure.
example: Germany cruised to a World Cup victory over the short-handed Australians.

meaning: Relating to the practice of cookery or the activity of cooking.
example: Her culinary skills were excellent.

meaning: Incorporating all current and previous data up to the present or at the time of measuring or collating
A soft mass of material stuffed into a cloth bag, used for comfort or support; for sitting on, kneeling on, resting one's head on etc.
example: to cushion a sofa

meaning: To build or alter according to personal preferences or specifications.
The time of daylight; the time between sunrise and sunset.
example: daytime television

meaning: A time limit in the form of a date on or before which something must be completed.
example: I must make this deadline or my boss will kill me!

meaning: A place that sells items, especially cars.
example: I visited the car dealership today.

meaning: In bookkeeping, an entry in the left hand column of an account.
example: A cash sale is recorded as debit on the cash account and as credit on the sales account.

meaning: Any raised flat surface that can be walked on: a balcony; a porch; a raised patio; a flat rooftop.
example: to swab the deck

meaning: To furnish with decorations.
example: We decorated the Christmas tree with tinsel and baubles.

meaning: The act of adorning, embellishing, or honoring; ornamentation.
The act of dedicating or the state of being dedicated.
To take one thing from another; remove from; make smaller by some amount.
example: I will deduct the cost of the can of peas from the money I owe you.

meaning: That which is deducted; that which is subtracted or removed
example: You might want to donate the old junk and just take the deduction.

meaning: A fault or malfunction.
example: a defect in the ear or eye; a defect in timber or iron; a defect of memory or judgment

meaning: A person or thing considered to be defective.
(grammar) A word or phrase that designates a specified or identified person or entity.
example: definite dimensions; a definite measure; a definite period or interval

meaning: A person authorized to act as representative for another; a deputy
A key that may be pressed to delete something (such as text or files) from a computer.
example: I lost the file when I accidentally hit delete.

meaning: A delicate item of clothing, especially underwear or lingerie.
example: Don't put that in with your jeans: it's a delicate!

meaning: Pleasing to taste; tasty.
example: The irony is delicious!

meaning: Very fine in quality or luxurious.
To destroy.
example: They demolished the old mill and put up four townhouses.

meaning: Cleaning and polishing of an animal's teeth.
A medical doctor who specializes in dentistry.
